name: Requiem: The Lost Voices
description:
Requiem: The Lost Voices

You wake up to find yourself chained up in an ancient mysterious castle. The memories of those that came before you are scattered about. Find the Skull to view these memories. Beware: You are not alone.

Made during a Game Jam. Theme: Projection

Team Credits:

  • Jake Klein: Game Engineer, Level Design, Voice Acting
  • Dylan Oelke: Game Engineer, Level Design, Voice Acting, UI Design
  • Adam Weber: Game Engineer, Level Design, Audio Engineer, Voice Acting
  • Levon Swenson: Game Engineer, Level Design
  • Dayne Farris: Game Engineer, Level Design
  • James Zajkowski: Game Engineer, Voice Acting, SFX
